channel.title: Installing multiple mods
channel.description: I am having trouble getting mods to work. I got the xinput1_3 put into binaries\win64 and the console appears, so the mods are loading, but they are not working correctly. All mods come with 3 type files: .pak ; .sig and data.json. So I am copying .pak and .sig files into the content\paks folder. But what do I do with the data.json file? it is the same name and the same extension in all of the mods and they just overwrite each other. I am guessing thats why the mods do not work properly. How do I fix this issue?

item.title: Installing multiple mods
item.dc:creator: @Bryce_Lumpkin Bryce Lumpkin
item.description:
@Bryce_Lumpkin wrote:

Which version was this? Version 5 or so had a bug with improperly initializing new portals that has been fixed in version 6 or 8 or so.

Edit: Also, jump on in the Discord since I check that semi-often (I only saw this since someone posted it in the discord )

Discord

Join the Satisfactory Modding Discord Server!

Check out the Satisfactory Modding community on Discord - hang out with 7,524 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

Read full topic

item.title: Installing multiple mods
item.dc:creator: @leo_b Leo B
item.description:
@leo_b wrote:

Well the issue i’m having is with the transportals mod. I have unlocked it in the hub, built 2 of them just for testing / figuring out purpose. They are powered, conveyor connected input/output, but they still won’t teleport until I reload the save. Moreover, every time I exit to main menu, the game just crashes and I have to restart. Then and only then the mod works.

Read full topic

item.title: Installing multiple mods
item.dc:creator: @Panakotta00 Panakotta00
item.description:
@Panakotta00 wrote:

Welcome to the modding forums ^^

Those files are just for SMR important, that means you can ignore the data.json files. You would need to explain what not works. If you mean stuff is not visible in the building menu, you need to unlock the HUB upgrades first.

Read full topic

item.title: Installing multiple mods
item.dc:creator: @leo_b Leo B
item.description:
@leo_b wrote:

I am having trouble getting mods to work. I got the xinput1_3 put into binaries\win64 and the console appears, so the mods are loading, but they are not working correctly. All mods come with 3 type files: .pak ; .sig and data.json. So I am copying .pak and .sig files into the content\paks folder. But what do I do with the data.json file? it is the same name and the same extension in all of the mods and they just overwrite each other. I am guessing thats why the mods do not work properly.
